items.name: Analytics - Senior Analys
items.long_desc:
Job Description:

You will be part of the team which partners with the business leaders to provide data driven strategies to grow business KPIs like acquisition, customer engagement & retention, campaign optimization, personalized offering, etc.
Leverage all the traditional and alternate data sources like credit bureau, digital data, partner data, social media and banking data to develop impactful strategies to drive business goals for marketing/product/customer/collections
Analyse large amounts of data and build solutions based on insights captured from data
Innovate with a focus on developing newer and better approaches using big data & machine learning solution
Develop portfolio MIS and track the portfolio performance and recommend course of action
Align closely with the client's business teams to deliver on the business goals through strong analytics driven strategies.

Role: Analytics - Senior Analyst
Industry Type: IT Services & Consulting
Department: Data Science & Analytics
Employment Type: Full Time, Permanent
Education: Masters or Bachelor's in Computer Science, Mathematics, Statistics or Engineering
Experience Required: 3-6 years
Location: Chennai
